content:
I understand your sentiment. many people miss the experience of attending live sports events and cheering for their favorite teams, but the pandemic has made it challenging to do so.

however, as the vaccine rollouts continue and the situation improves, there is hope that things will return to normal, and sports leagues like hockey east will be able to welcome back fans to live events. in the meantime, many leagues have found ways to continue playing and engaging with fans through virtual and socially distanced events, providing some much-needed entertainment and a sense of community during a difficult time.
